'''1.21.50.1''' is the third Preview version of [[Minecraft Education 1.21.90]], released on December 17, 2024, for ChromeOS and Android, and December 22 for Windows, which adds features from '''[[The Garden Awakens]]''' drop.<ref>{{cite|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/33201022766356-What-s-New-in-the-Garden-Awakens-Preview-Beta-v1-21-51|title=What's New in the Garden Awakens Preview/Beta v1.21.51|website=Minecraft Education Support}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.21.50}}

* Added features from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.50]], '''[[The Garden Awakens]]'''.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
;Cloud Storage
* Support for larger world sizes
* Lower error rates and better upload and download performance 

;Multiplayer & Coding
* Multiplayer sign-in & connecting updated for better reliability
* Coding infrastructure updated for better stability & performance

== Fixes ==
* Improvements to performance and product stability.</onlyinclude>
